titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5863) to provide tax relief with respect to certain Federal disasters.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5863) to provide tax relief with respect to certain Federal disasters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Steube. Petition No: 118-11.
Motion to discharge the Committee on Rules filed by Mr. Steube. Assigned to the Discharge Calendar, Calendar No. 1.
UNANIMOUS CONSENT REQUEST - Mr. Steil asked unanimous consent that H. Res. 961 be laid on the table. Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5863) to provide tax relief with respect to certain federal disasters.
